title: Update PacePower app logo

requirements.text: Create a new PacePower logo image (replacing the current header logo) and include it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo is visually distinct from the old logo and reads as PacePower branding (visual mark only; no required text).
The image has a transparent background (or otherwise looks correct on both light and dark backgrounds).

requirements.text: Update the app header to use the new PacePower logo image instead of /assets/generated/run-logo.dim_512x512.png, without changing the visible app name text ('PacePower') or the logo alt text ('PacePower').
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo displayed in the UI uses the new image path.
The header still shows the text label 'PacePower'.
The header logo alt attribute remains 'PacePower'.
No other screens are broken by the logo change.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources must be composed, not edited).
Do not change backend code/state; this is a frontend-only branding asset update.
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall UI theme or color palette beyond what is necessary for the logo swap.
Changing the app name text (it should remain 'PacePower').
Adding third-party branding assets or external image hosting.

edits: Redesign the existing logo with updated PacePower branding (run-logo.dim_512x512.png > pacepower-logo.dim_512x512.png)
